descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Face your fears. Reclaim your calm. All inside a next-gen VR experience.

Do you feel anxious in airplanes, elevators, tunnels, or crowded places? ClaustrOFF is a transformative VR game designed to help you overcome fear and anxiety using exposure therapy techniques, trusted by professionals and proven by science.

Through engaging challenges and immersive environments, you’ll learn to manage your thoughts, stay grounded under pressure, and grow stronger with every step. ClaustrOFF turns therapy into a meaningful adventure—making personal growth feel like a game.

What makes ClaustrOFF unique:

🎮 Interactive gameplay rooted in psychology: Practice real mental techniques in VR.
🌍 Explore detailed, immersive environments: Each space is crafted to simulate real-life triggers in a safe way.
🧘‍♂️ Guided exercises for anxiety relief: Calm breathing, grounding, and mental control—all built into gameplay.
⏱️ Fast results: Experience real change in just a few short sessions.
👨‍⚕️ Backed by experts: Developed in collaboration with mental health professionals.

Whether you’re curious about VR therapy, looking for a new kind of challenge, or ready to take control of your anxiety, ClaustrOFF is here to guide you—step by step.

Ready to feel brave again?
Download ClaustrOFF and unlock the first part of your journey to confidence today.
